title: Uncoil a Night
description: A volume of poems that touch on subjects ranging from childhood memories to the complicated emotions of love, friendships, loss, joy, and the love of poetry itself. A conversation sometimes with oneself, sometimes with the reader, mostly at night when guards are down and emotions are raw and honest. All proceeds are donated to Syrian Armenian Relief Fund (SARF) to aid families caught in the middle of a war. http://www.syrianarmenianrelieffund.org
author: Silva Zanoyan Merjanian
